direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the rendering of API changes with similar control flows and output handling.
Both methods process and render lists of endpoints, albeit with different contexts (new, missing, deprecated).
Both methods involve appending content to an OutputStreamWriter with exception handling.
Both methods access and process API response data for rendering purposes.
Both methods access and process API parameter data for rendering purposes.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of RefPointer for schema resolution.
Environment setup is required before rendering the API diff.
This method must be invoked after setting up the environment and before finalizing the render.
This method must be invoked to list endpoints before rendering the final output.
This method can be used to verify the correctness of the rendered output.
This method can be used to assert the compatibility status of the rendered API diff.
